name: Air -2236 A.D. Original Soundtrack-
summary:
Air is original soundtrack to 2236 A.D.

This soundtrack contains 69 tracks across 4 CDs featuring music from 2236 A.D. Tracks are available in FLAC and MP3 format and also contain liner notes from the physical CD release.

*The track with the notation (mini) is partly excerpted from the original music because of the directing intention in the game.
**The track is arranged from the original music because of the directing intention in the game.
info:
• 厂牌: Sekai Project
  • 录音: Chloro
  • 别名: Air -西曆2236年 Original Soundtrack-
  • 发售日期: 2018.7.24
  • 价格: 16.99 USD (Package Price)
  • 碟片数量: 4
  • 官网: https://store.steampowered.com/app/890420/Air__2236_AD_Original_Soundtrack/
